description: Non-material amendment to planning permission APP/K/5600/D/24/3347089 24/02043 (Rear extension on all floors. Single storey rear extension to existing garage. Provision of terrace at rear raised ground floor level. Mansard roof extension with traditional dormers. Alterations to fenestration at rear. Addition of conservation type roof lights to garage roof. Removal of non original conservatory at rear, existing uPVC rainwater goods, and non original railings at front entrance. Reinstatement of period rainwater goods, garage doors, and railings.) to allow fenestration changes on the approved rear elevation in order to improve the appearance of the rear elevation and functionality and outlook of the rooms facing the garden.
